item.title: Ian McDonald
item.description: Ian McDonald is an English multi-instrumental musician, best known as a founding member of progressive rock band King Crimson, formed in 1969, and of the hard rock band Foreigner in 1976. He is well known as a rock session musician, predominantly as a saxophonist. He also plays keyboards, flute, vibraphone and guitar.

item.title: Mick Jones
item.description: Michael Leslie 'Mick' Jones is an English musician, singer, songwriter, and record producer, best known as the only remaining founding member of the British-American rock band Foreigner. Prior to Foreigner, he was in the band Spooky Tooth.
